name: Goose VS Marine Apocalypse
description:
Game made for DBR GameJam #4!

A Goose Fighting a Marine Apocalypse!

Kill the shrimp enemies and level up and get upgrades.

Have a fun, quack!

Controls:

  • W A S D  = Move.
  • Left Click = Shot.
  • ESC  = Pause.

Music: 

This is a pack of music made by @3xBlast

https://opengameart.org/content/3xblast-free-music-pack-15-songs

https://opengameart.org/content/battle-theme-b-for-rpg
